scenes.background: Bob thanks you for extending your time on the call.
scenes.description: We need one more thing from you. Can you review this document before you go?

options.text: Alright, I'll quickly review it and provide my feedback.
options.analysis: You agreed to review the document, showing empathy and motivation, but potentially compromising your self-regulation.

options.text: I think it can wait. Let's handle it when I'm back.
options.analysis: You suggested handling it later, maintaining boundaries and demonstrating good self-regulation, but empathy and motivation were lower.

options.text: I'm afraid I can't. Please proceed without me and update me later.
options.analysis: You prioritized your leave, showing good emotional perception and self-regulation, but social skills could improve.
